title: Indigeneous Australians: an Aboriginal community focus (A)
creator_credit: New South Wales. Technical and Further Education and Monitor Interactive
brief_description: An interactive CD-ROM from TAFE which is the first to draw on the comprehensive knowledge and expertise of Aboriginal community members and is an invaluable teaching resource. The concept behind this CD-ROM is to let members of various Aboriginal Communities become teachers of their rich culture. A resource guide accompanies the CD-ROM. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: This CD-ROM is compatible on both Macintosh and IBM compatible PC’s.
